ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bard equip (was Katanas)
ygData.msgSnippet: Have to agree, I ve been using my Journeyman (Tash) stick since about 45th and it s awesome. The proc message seems bugged so I never know if it goes off
ygData.messageBody:
Have to agree, I've been using my Journeyman (Tash) stick since about 45th
and it's awesome. The proc message seems bugged so I never know if it goes
off unless I see the message that the effect wore off and the mob rarely
lasts that long. (I have spell effects turned off.)

From group member reports however, it goes off almost every fight. Hits
pretty good too. I usually have it in my primary and a blackjack in
secondary. Weak weapons at 52 I know, but I don't play enough to wheel and
deal for upgrades in GFay. Still waiting for my BoH to drop :-).

Tzeetch, bard of 52 ballads
The Commune, Xegony

--- Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:

Have to agree -- always put the faster weapon in primary. the tash stick
is an awesome weapon for a bard. So many of our songs get resisted and the
stick should help quite a lot with that.
